scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -f FraudDetection.zip && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.zip: zip -r FraudDetection.zip node_modules/ && zip -j FraudDetection.zip dist/*
scripts.deploy: aws durable-lambda create-function --function-name fn_FraudDetection --runtime nodejs22.x --role $ROLE_ARN --handler index.handler --code S3Bucket=jlosaws-lambda-packages,S3Key=FraudDetection.zip --memory-size 128 --durable-config '{'ExecutionTimeout':600,'RetentionPeriodInDays':7}'
